segments.text: How is your job search going , Janet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I found the ideal position . I ’ m working for a plumbing company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you serious ? You studied mathematics at college for four years , and now you have a job working with your hands !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Plumbing work requires mathematics knowledge , and creativity . I love this job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can see that . But I didn ’ t know you had experience in that line of work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn ’ t , but I applied for an apprenticeship , and since I studied math , AND I have a good attitude , my application was accepted .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Congratulations ! You do have the right attitude .
segments.speaker: S1
